sentences.en: A few years later , however, the Court relaxed this seemingly stringent requirement.
sentences.cn: 但几年以后, 最高法院放宽了这项看起来很苛刻的要求.

sentences.en: A major addition to the earlier revisions of the questionnaire is the job requirement exercise.
sentences.cn: 之前对问卷的修改主要是增加了一些和工作要求有关的问题。

sentences.en: A second-class honours degree is the minimum requirement.
sentences.cn: 至少须获得二级优等荣誉学位。

sentences.en: Every individual has a physiological requirement for each nutrient.
sentences.cn: 每个人对每种营养成分都有一种生理上的需要.

sentences.en: Evidence of basic proficiency in English is part of the admission requirement.
sentences.cn: 英语基本熟练是入学条件之一。

sentences.en: Hemagglutination of some viruses has a particular PH requirement.
sentences.cn: 某些病毒的血凝反应需要一定的PH值.

sentences.en: How does the offset requirement work in practice?
sentences.cn: “补偿要求”在实践中怎样实施?

sentences.en: If you are installing a new bathroom, it has to meet the requirements of the Building Regulations.
sentences.cn: 建新的浴室必须符合《建筑法规》的规定。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, in most cases the " federal " requirement poses little difficulty.
sentences.cn: 不过在大多数情况下, “ 联邦 ” 这一规定很少遇到麻烦.

sentences.en: Patience is a requirement in teaching.
sentences.cn: 耐心是教学必备的条件.

sentences.en: The refugees’ main requirements are food and shelter.
sentences.cn: 难民的主要需求是食物和住所。

sentences.en: The requirement for work permits violates the spirit of the 1950 treaty.
sentences.cn: 对工作许可证的要求违反了1950年条约的精神。

sentences.en: The requirement is enforced by the Office of Management and Budget.
sentences.cn: 这一要求由行政管理与预算局负责执行.

sentences.en: They must therefore satisfy the requirement that they be noncoplanar.
sentences.cn: 因此他们一定满足不共面的要求.

sentences.en: This requirement manifests itself in terms of multiple sources.
sentences.cn: 这一要求本身表明要用多震源.

sentences.en: Thus, a broad range of wetlands are subject to the permit requirement.
sentences.cn: 因此, 沼泽地的宽阔边界以需要限度为条件.

sentences.en: Two measures have been introduced as legal requirements .
sentences.cn: 已有两项措施作为法定要求实施。

sentences.cn: 你要求她等到下周是有道理的.
